name: Mayday (itch) (Heimsel)
description:
This Game was made for the Make a Level Game Jam "Mayday"
I recommend a Gamepdad to play the Game! Check the framerate (Number on the top right) at the start of your session, the game must run at 60fps or some bugs might happen. Changing the scalability and restarting usually does the trick. 

You play as a Spaceship, that got lost in a galactical Formation. Power up your Weapons and dodge the hostile Environment to make the Escape. 

I used some Quixel Megascans to populate the environent.

Also I took one day to compose the soundtrack and i am very happy, how it turned out :)
Enjoy!
